FuncDef:
The loopback-detect enable command enables the self-loop detection function on an interface.
The undo loopback-detect enable command disables the self-loop detection function on the interface.
By default, the self-loop detection function is disabled on the interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the self-loop detection function on an interface, run the loop-detect enable command. After the self-loop detection function is enabled, the self-loop on an interface can be detected and then the interface is blocked.
